definition: row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense

sentences.english: She marked the date on her calendar.
sentences.chinese: 她在她的行事曆上給那個日期做記號。

sentences.english: Please see attachment for 2010 Fall calendar.
sentences.chinese: 下學期行事曆在附件中。

sentences.english: According to the university calendar your examinations will be in June.
sentences.chinese: 依照大學的行事曆，你們的考試將在六月舉行。

sentences.english: Students and families will be notified if there are any changes to the above calendar.
sentences.chinese: 以上行事曆如有任何更改，學校將另行通知。

sentences.english: You will be notified if any changes are made to the below calendars.
sentences.chinese: 行事曆如有任何更改，學校將另行通知。

sentences.english: This calendar provides the lecture topics for the course.
sentences.chinese: 本行事曆提供此課程的授課主題。

sentences.english: If it’s not on my to-do list, I don’t stop to eat lunch.
sentences.chinese: 如果它不在我的行事曆上，那我就不會停下來喫午餐。

sentences.english: The following class notes correspond to the lecture topics outlined in the calendar section.
sentences.chinese: 下列課堂講稿與在行事曆部分中概述的演講題目一致。

sentences.english: Jack, could you check your calendar?
sentences.chinese: 傑克，請你查查行事曆好嗎？

sentences.english: Any changes to this calendar will be notified separately.
sentences.chinese: 本行事曆若有變動則另行通知。

sentences.english: For some guys, the annual fishing trip is the highlight of their calendar.
sentences.chinese: 有些人把每年的釣魚之旅視爲是行事曆上的重頭戲。

sentences.english: This course features an in-depth course calendar.
sentences.chinese: 這本課的特色在於一份詳細的課程行事曆。

sentences.english: Please refer to the attachment of the event posted on the TCS for details.
sentences.chinese: 詳情請參閱培訓行事曆上有關活動附件。

sentences.english: September seventeenth, you can download the schedule on line.
sentences.chinese: 九月十七號，你可以在線上下載行事曆。
